## Media Storages

> `host`/media/`module`/`path`

> ex: [https://ms-uat.career.support/meida/school/logo/sample.ext](https://ms-uat.career.support/meida/school/logo/sample.ext)

### available media

* webinar-akbar
* school
* school_news
* candidate
* company
* employer
* e-learning
* superadmin
* bkk-admin

item.name: Tracer Study

response.name: Get Tracer Question OK

request.description:
## params
>`use form data cus it may contais files`.
> **pass field key `submit`(bool) to save and submit**
```
"tracer_id"             => "required|exists:$tbTracer,id",
"answer"                => "required|array|min:1",
"answer.*.question_id"  => "required",
"answer.*.answer_type"  => 'required',
"answer.*.answer_text"  => "string",
"answer.*.answer_choice"=> "array_integer|array_object"
```
`only for answer type 6(Linear Scale) choice must type of object. the example format you can see below`
## questio/answer type number
>- SHORT_TEXT = 0; `answer_text`(required)
>- PARAGRAPH = 1; `answer_text`(required)
>- MULTIPLE = 2; `answer_choice`(required)
>- CHECKBOX = 3; `answer_choice`(required)
>- DROPDOWN = 4; `answer_choice`(required)
>- UPLOAD_FILE = 5; `answer_file`(required)
>- LINEAR_SCALE = 6; `answer_choice`(required)
>>answer_choice format
>>```
{
      "question_id":111,
      "answer_type": 6,
      "answer_choice": [
            {
                  "id": 111,
                  "range_answer": 2
            }
      ]
}
```

response.name: Save Answer (ERR)
Submit Answer (ERR)

## params
```
"replace"           => "string",

"list.*.id"         => "string",
"list.*.name"       => "string",

"image"             => "file|mimes:jpg,jpeg,png,gif,svg",
"about"             => "string",
```
### NOTE
> ***only one of (list and id or name) will be executed if both is present only list will executed***
> - `if param id is present` system will check existing teacher id
> - `if param name is present` system will create new teacher
> - `if param replace is present` system will delete all then create new teacher
> - `list param is present` system will validate `object items`(like above)

request.description:
## params
```
"course_id"         => "required|numeric|min:0",
'list'              => "array|min:1",
"list.*.id"         => "string",
"list.*.name"       => "string",
"list.*.position"   => "string",
"list.*.image"      => "file|mimes:jpg,jpeg,png,gif,svg",
"list.*.about"      => "string",
"id"                => "numeric|min:0",
"name"              => "string",
"position"          => "string",
"image"             => "file|mimes:jpg,jpeg,png,gif,svg",
"about"             => "string",
```
### NOTE
> ***only one of (list and id or name) will be executed if both is present only list will executed***
> - `if param id is present` system will check existing teacher id
> - `id param name is present` system will create new teacher
> - `list param is present` system will validate `object items`(like above)

request.description:
## params `SIGGLE QUESTIONS`
>this params for create singgle question
```
"question"      => "required|string",
"description"   => "string",
"answer_type"   => ["required", Rule::in(TracerQuestionType::toArray())],
"required"      => "boolean",
"index"         => "numeric|min:0",
"tracer_study_id" => ($validateTracerID?"required|":"")."numeric",
"choice"        => "array"
```

## params `MULTIPLE QUESTIONS`
>this params for create multiple questions 
```
"list_question" => "required"
"list_question.*.<params of siggle question>" : ???
```

## questions type
>- const SHORT_TEXT = 0;
>- const PARAGRAPH = 1;
>- const MULTIPLE = 2;
>- const CHECKBOX = 3;
>- const DROPDOWN = 4;
>- const UPLOAD_FILE = 5;
>- const LINEAR_SCALE = 6;

## validation case
- case TracerQuestionType::MULTIPLE:
- case TracerQuestionType::CHECKBOX:
- case TracerQuestionType::DROPDOWN:
```
"choice.*.choice_text"=>"required|string"
```

- case TracerQuestionType::LINEAR_SCALE:
```
"range_start"   => "required|numeric",
"range_end"     => "required|numeric",
"end_text"      => "required|string",
"start_text"    => "required|string",
```

request.description:
## params `SIGGLE QUESTIONS`
>this params for create singgle question
```
"question"      => "required|string",
"description"   => "string",
"answer_type"   => ["required", Rule::in(TracerQuestionType::toArray())],
"required"      => "boolean",
"index"         => "numeric|min:0",
"tracer_study_id" => ($validateTracerID?"required|":"")."numeric",
"choice"        => "array"
```

## params `MULTIPLE QUESTIONS`
>this params for create multiple questions 
```
"list_question" => "required"
"list_question.*.<params of siggle question>" : ???
```

## questions type
>- const SHORT_TEXT = 0;
>- const PARAGRAPH = 1;
>- const MULTIPLE = 2;
>- const CHECKBOX = 3;
>- const DROPDOWN = 4;
>- const UPLOAD_FILE = 5;
>- const LINEAR_SCALE = 6;

## validation case
- case TracerQuestionType::MULTIPLE:
- case TracerQuestionType::CHECKBOX:
- case TracerQuestionType::DROPDOWN:
```
"choice.*.choice_text"=>"required|string"
```

- case TracerQuestionType::LINEAR_SCALE:
```
"range_start"   => "required|numeric",
"range_end"     => "required|numeric",
"end_text"      => "required|string",
"start_text"    => "required|string",
```

request.description:
*   filename - `required`
*   TargetEndpoint - `required`
*   pageSize - `dimensions of the ISO 216 A series`
*   width - number
*   height - number
*   orientation - `landscape` or `portrait`
    

when template `css`has `@page` system will use this to set the viewport

example:

``` css
@page {
    size: A4;
}

```

###### NOTE

you can access the generated file via url [https://ms-uat.career.support/media/output/](https://ms-uat.career.support/media/output/<filename>)`filename`. the generated file will deleted hourly by system so `you must save the response`

request.description:
### Order Variants

1.  created
2.  city
    

params :

```
year : < date-year : YYYY >
order : < order-variant : string >

```

### order variants

*`NOTE: each variants have different response`*

1.  school
2.  major
3.  enrollment
    

params:

``` plaintext
year : < date-year : YYYY >
order : < order-variant : string >
page: < number >

```

```
year : < date-year : YYYY >
month : < date-month : MM > 

```

> EVENT TYPES:
> 
> JOBFAIR = 0
> 
> WEBINAR = 0
